entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 01 January 2023
